lead_paragraph: Argentina's Davis Cup champions returned to a heroes' welcome in Buenos Aires on Tuesday after clinching their maiden title with a stunning 3-2 win over Croatia at the weekend.

headline.print_headline: Argentina's Davis Cup Winners Return to Heroes' Welcome
headline.main: Argentina's Davis Cup Winners Return to Heroes' Welcome
